backend/main.mo: Main backend actor handling user profiles with roles, ambulance/police locations, SOS alerts, authorization checks, and distance calculations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user profiles to include phone numbers while preserving other stored state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their roles in authentication, UI, mapping, and query logic.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with OKLCH variables for light/dark themes and emergency color palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Leaflet from CDN and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component controlling authentication, profile setup, and routing to ambulance or police interfaces.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying attribution and branding.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header showing branding, share controls, logged-in user info, and logout action.
frontend/src/components/LinkDomainInfoPa: Provides a dialog showing the app's share URL and guidance on configuring custom domains.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Displays a login screen with role icons and triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Collects user name, phone number, and role, validates input, and saves the profile via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/RealtimeMap.tsx: Initializes a Leaflet map, updates center and markers with smoothing, and handles tile/load errors.
frontend/src/components/ShareAppLinkCont: Lets users copy the app's share URL using the Clipboard API with a fallback input method.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state and providing login/clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles, SOS actions, and ambulance/police location updates with backend integration and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables including light/dark modes and emergency color themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceInterface.ts: Implements the ambulance UI for live location tracking, SOS activation, and map display with timed updates.
frontend/src/pages/PoliceInterface.tsx: Implements the police UI for nearby ambulance tracking, SOS alert monitoring, and continuous location updates.
frontend/src/types/leaflet-global.d.ts: Adds a TypeScript declaration for the global Leaflet object on window.
frontend/src/utils/getShareUrl.ts: Returns the current browser URL including origin, path, query, and hash for sharing.
frontend/src/utils/leafletMarkers.ts: Provides utilities for building and comparing custom Leaflet map marker icons.
frontend/src/utils/locationRefresh.ts: Defines constants and helpers for location update timing and distance formatting.
frontend/src/utils/locationSmoothing.ts: Implements GPS smoothing utilities using thresholds, Haversine distance, and low-pass filtering.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, existing features, and pending feature requests for ambulance contact capture and police radar display.
